name: MAGICAL ANGEL FAIRY PRINCESS
description:
The story

The Fairy Princess is on a mission to save the city after a troop of mysterious modified humans have invaded it.

Dynamic Action

Magical Angel Fairy Princess is a belt-scrolling action game.
To overcome your opponents, you can employ a number of skills, such as throws, magic assaults, and dash attacks.
Each stage has an adjustable difficulty level, so the harder the challenge, the larger the rewards.

The development

You'll gain different development points as you level up and defeat monsters throughout the game.
Your character can be strengthened in a number of ways with the help of these points, including offense, defense, magic, and the type of balance.

Rape assault

If an enemy grabs you or if you are lying down and don't get up right away, you will be raped.
Your HP will steadily drop as you are being raped until it is zero, at which point you will enter an event animation.
By raising your Rape Resistance stats, you can leave the area swiftly.
It is advised that you gradually build your Rape Resistance because being raped by a boss enemy makes it challenging to flee from the scene.

CG Mode and ExtraCG Mode

Depending on your clothing, failing a mission results in one of three dynamic CG animation events: dressed, half-dressed, or undressed.
In Gallery mode, the gathered animations can be played back.
